_meanings:
{@--5@} A name assumed by
Bhīma at the court of Virāṭa.

{@--4@} Blades of barley planted at the
commencement of the Daśarā and
gathered at its close.

{@--5@} The rising
of the asterism Rohiṇī at midnight
on the eighth day of the dark half
of Śrāvaṇa {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} on the birth day of
Kṛṣṇa.

{2} the label
on the fore-head of a horse turned
loose for the Aśvamedha sacrifice.
